original_text: And now I ask you, dear lady—not as though I were writing you a new commandment, but the one we have had from the beginning—that we love one another.
korean_text: 부녀여, 내가 이제 네게 구하노니 서로 사랑하자 이는 새 계명 같이 네게 쓰는 것이 아니요 처음부터 우리가 가진 것이라

sentences.original_text: And now I ask you, dear lady
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이제 사랑하는 부인이여, 내가 당신에게 청하니

sentences.original_text: not as though I were writing you a new commandment
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신에게 새 계명을 쓰는 것이 아니라

sentences.original_text: but the one we have had from the beginning
